thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Sports-Themed Massager (SFO-106)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Sports-Themed Massager (SFO-106) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Sports-Themed Massager (SFO-106)
text:
A leading invention submission company, InventHelp is submitting the SPORTS MASSAGER to companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 25, 2015
"I was experiencing some aches and pains, and I wanted to be able to massage them away," said an inventor from Vallejo, Calif. "I came up with this idea so that I could rub tension and soreness away. I thought that it would be more appealing if it had a sports-themed design."
He created a prototype for the patented SPORTS MASSAGER to effectively relieve aches and pains on any area of the body. The accessory provides a soothing and relaxing effect, and lessens muscular stress and tension. The unit is designed to be convenient, effective and therapeutic. Furthermore, the design shows support for a favorite sports team.
The original design was submitted to the San Francisco office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-SFO-106, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
